metadata.description: Unique DNS Name for the Storage Account where the Virtual Machine's disks will be placed.
User name for the Virtual Machine.
The Ubuntu version for the VM. This will pick a fully patched image of this given Ubuntu version.
Type of authentication to use on the Virtual Machine. SSH key is recommended.
SSH Key or password for the Virtual Machine. SSH key is recommended.

packages:
  - moby-cli
  - moby-engine
runcmd:
  - dcs="', variables('dcs'),'"
  - |
      set -x
      (

        # Wait for docker daemon to start
        while [ $(ps -ef | grep -v grep | grep docker | wc -l) -le 0 ]; do 
          sleep 3
        done

        apt install -y aziot-edge

        if [ ! -z $dcs ]; then
          mkdir /etc/aziot
          wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/iotedge-vm-deploy/1.2/config.toml -O /etc/aziot/config.toml
          sed -i "s#\(connection_string = \).*#\1\"$dcs\"#g" /etc/aziot/config.toml
          iotedge config apply -c /etc/aziot/config.toml
        fi

      ) &
